description: This is a Java class named 'Tracker' that manages collections of generated objects, enums, variables referenced by events, and POJOs in a code generation context. It provides methods to add, retrieve, and check the existence of these elements, aiding in tracking generated code components.

classes.name: Tracker
classes.description: A class to track generated objects, enums, variables, and POJOs for code generation processes.

methods.name: addGeneratedObject
methods.description: Adds a new Generated object to the internal set.

methods.name: getGeneratedObjectForClassName
methods.description: Retrieves a Generated object matching the provided class name.

methods.name: getGeneratedObjectForVarName
methods.description: Retrieves a Generated object matching the provided variable name.

methods.name: addGeneratedEnumType
methods.description: Tracks a new enum type by name.

methods.name: hasGeneratedEnumType
methods.description: Checks if a specific enum type has been generated.

methods.name: addEventReferenceVariable
methods.description: Marks a variable as referenced by events.

methods.name: isVariableReferencedByEvents
methods.description: Checks if a variable is referenced by events.

methods.name: hasGeneratedPojo
methods.description: Checks if a POJO with given name has been generated.

methods.name: addPojoHeaderFile
methods.description: Associates a header filename with a POJO variable.

methods.name: getPojoHeaderFile
methods.description: Retrieves header filename for a POJO variable.

methods.name: addPojoEncodeFunction
methods.description: Associates an encode function with a POJO variable.

methods.name: getPojoEncodeFunction
methods.description: Retrieves encode function name for a POJO variable.

methods.name: addPojoDecodeFunction
methods.description: Associates a decode function with a POJO variable.

methods.name: getPojoDecodeFunction
methods.description: Retrieves decode function name for a POJO variable.
